title: Teacher Professional Development Design Summit for Supporting High-Ability Students

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in Secondary Education Curriculum Operations and Basic Instructional Design Knowledge
context.additional_context: Participants must engage in activities within a smartphone-based limited technological environment, with performance measured through project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Participants can design a framework to analyze the learning needs of high-ability students.
Participants can develop two or more prototype instructional materials for teacher professional development.
Participants can improve educational materials by incorporating feedback from diverse stakeholders (teachers, administrators, parents).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
